column4: can anyone help with boot recovery? i'm stuck using a live cd atm
What are you trying to do with boot recovery?
i can only get as far as the command line since gdm fails with ureadahead and dbus errors from missing /var/lib folders/files
Hmm. Is this on the CD or the actual PC's file system.
it's on the harddisk .... where /var is on a separate partition
now i'm stuck using a live cd where i am chrooted into my boot partition ... i can give some pastebin results from that
Well, do you have any idea how it ended up liike that?
afaik, the last thing i did was update my software and my reboot failed since then ... i'm using natty 64-bit with a separated /var partition
Perhaps it's not able to mount the partition of /var?
tru, /var folders cant mount on the filesystem but can using live cd ... except /var/lib turn up empty (which seems to be the culprit, from surfing)
sorry, i'm kinda still a newbie *blush*
i dont have any pastebin for my reboots, but i have a pastebin for chroot activities on live cd: http://pastebin.com/qYAwWwLh
That's all fine-- I had to learn the rules once too. Anyway, I personally am not that in-depth skilled. However, my first thought is to perhaps copy the /var/lib from the CD's File System.
when i chroot to my boot partition sda1 in live cd, the /var partition sda10 automatically mounts as well (but with no /var/lib)
how do i msg more than 1 person at at time on here?
What do you mean, make a chat message that flags more than one user?
yes, flag more than 1 user with a msg
I'm guessing just separate their names with commas.
